about_the_game:
QuadUrbs is a minimalistic city builder game where you can place variety of tiles containing skyscrapers, residential buildings, park, water, metro, food stalls etc. to build well detailed and beautiful city quickly without worrying much about resource management aspect.

There are two modes:

1. Scoring - You start with limited tiles and have to strategically place tiles next to each other such that you get maximum scoring points and then get more tiles to place. You can also earn points by completing the quests which will help to get more tiles faster.

2. Sandbox - You are free to choose any tiles you wish and can place next to each other as per your needs to create city of your dreams.

Water Tiles - You can place water tiles next to each other to create rivers, seas and lakes. Along beaches will be created on placing them next to other non-water tiles,

Metro System - You can place metro tiles in order to create a well functioning metro system which can enhance connectivity within your city!

Please feel free to reach out to me for any feedback or queries. Thanks!
